Keyword_Questions.name: Questions
Keyword_Questions.Q0: What is the ID of the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Q1: What is a keyword or term used in MAIDS that you believe would be helpful to describe the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Q2: What is the definition of the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Q3: What is the link to online material further discussing of the keyword?

Keyword_1.name: Keyword 1
Keyword_1.A2: A simple whole blood collection and culture system for quantifying physiological reactions and interactions of the human immune system in the clinic.

Keyword_2.name: Keyword 2
Keyword_2.A2: The product range includes optimized antibody combinations for the identification and characterization of cells of the human immune system.

Keyword_3.name: Keyword 3
Keyword_3.A2: The unstimulated control in the TruCulture assay

Keyword_4.name: Keyword 4
Keyword_4.A2: Lipopolysccharide. Bacterial stimuli in the TruCulture assay.

Keyword_5.name: Keyword 5
Keyword_5.A2: Resiquimod. Viral stimuli in the TruCulture assay.

Keyword_6.name: Keyword 6
Keyword_6.A2: Polyinosinic:polycytidylic acid. Viral stimul in the TruCulture assay.

Keyword_7.name: Keyword 7
Keyword_7.A2: Heat killde candida albicans. Fungal stimuli in the TruCulture assay.

Keyword_8.name: Keyword 8
Keyword_8.A2: T-cell receptor/coreceptor stimuli in the TruCulture assay. Induces a T-cell response

Keyword_9.name: Keyword 9
Keyword_9.A2: Interferon alpha. Cytokine protein, important for initial anti-viral response.

Keyword_10.name: Keyword 10
Keyword_10.A2: Interfron gamma. Cytokine protein, involved in activaiton of innate immune cells and in T-cell response. Important for antiviral and antibacterial immune response.

Keyword_11.name: Keyword 11
Keyword_11.A2: Interleukin 10. Cytokine protein with immune modulatory/ immunosuppressive effects

Keyword_12.name: Keyword 12
Keyword_12.A2: Interleukin 12. Cytokine protein important for activation of T-cell repsonse

Keyword_13.name: Keyword 13
Keyword_13.A2: Interleukin 17 A. Cytokine protient, an effector protein of a specific T-cell subset (Th17 T-cells), important for defence againg extracellular bacteria and fungi.

Keyword_14.name: Keyword 14
Keyword_14.A2: Interleukin 1 beta. Cytokine protein, important for acute inflammatory response.

Keyword_15.name: Keyword 15
Keyword_15.A2: Interleukin 6. Cytokine protein, important in acute inlfammation and acute phase reactant and mediator of fever.

Keyword_16.name: Keyword 16
Keyword_16.A2: Interleukin 8. Cytokine protein. Important for recruitment and activation of neutrophils and other innate effector cells.

Keyword_17.name: Keyword 17
Keyword_17.A2: Tumor necrosis factor alpha. Cytokine protein, important for acute inflammatory response.
